title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not have any effect. There is no change or update in the field's Javadoc documentation. This behavior is unexpected and needs to be addressed.
EB: I expect that when I select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu of a field in TH, the action should add Javadoc to that field. Alternatively, the 'Add Javadoc' option should be removed from the context menu if it is not intended to perform any action.
